= How to compile Sayonara =


You can get the most recent version on the svn server

  * svn checkout http://sayonara-player.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ sayonara-player-read-only

There is also a source archive in the [http://code.google.com/p/sayonara-player/downloads/list Download] section. It is not the most recent version, but the version of the latest release

== Libraries ==

  * Qt >= 4.6: Gui, Core, Xml, Sqlite http://qt.nokia.com/products/
  * libcurl http://curl.haxx.se/libcurl/
  * Taglib http://developer.kde.org/~wheeler/taglib.html
  * Gstreamer development files, GStreamer plugins 
  * Cmake


== Linux ==


  * cmake
  * Qt >= 4.6 + development files (qt4-core, qt4-gui-, qt4-xml, qt4-sql, qt4-sqlite)
  * libqtcore4 (on some distributions it's not installed by default)
  * libtaglib
  * Gstreamer 0.10 + development files (libgstreamer0.10, libgstreamer-plugins-base0.10)
  * libcurl

  * OPTIONAL: For notifications: libnotify + development files

=== apt-get ===
	
  * apt-get install libqt4-dev libqtcore4 libtaglib2.0-cil libcurl4-gnutls-dev libgstreamer0.10-dev libgstreamer-plugins-base0.10-dev cmake
  * for notifications
    apt-get install libnotify-dev

  In order to compile Sayonara you have to use cmake now.

  * cmake .
  * make
  * make install (as root)

  Sayonara player itself and the Gstreamer backend are built and installed automatically.

  Debian packages can be created by executing the *2debian.sh scripts in the linux_packages folder

== Windows ==

Not supported yet

== MAC ==

Same as for Linux, try to fetch all packages with MacPorts.
